level.heading: EDUCATION REQUIREMENTS (§ 17-8602) Except as otherwise provided in this chapter, an applicant for registration toractice as a psychology associate shall furnish proof satisfactory to theoard, in accordance with § 906 of the Act (D.C. Official Code § 3-1209.06),hat the applicant has graduated with a master’s or doctoral degree focusingn psychology from a program judged by the Board to be substantially equivalentn subject matter and extent of training to a master’s or doctoral degree insychology from an institution which was accredited, at the time the degree wasonferred, by an accrediting body recognized by the Secretary of the Unitedtates Department of Education or the Council on Postsecondary Accreditation.
SOURCE
level.text: Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 58 DCR 3246, 3247 (April 15,011); as corrected by Errata Notice published at 59 DCR 8356 (July 13, 2012).
